amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for exercising direction, supervision, or control over the content or distribution of public telecommunications programs and services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for exercising direction, supervision, or control over the content or distribution of public telecommunications programs and services in violation of the Communications Act of 1934.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 218 (Roll no. 314).
